ModMetaData.name: Orbital Bionics Trader
ModMetaData.author: Apathetic Slug
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds in an orbital bionics trader. They have 1-4 of every implant/artificial limb/organ, as well as a decent amount of silver. Should be compatible with any mod that puts their bionics/implants under the "TechHediff" tradeTag.
